name: MakePlace
description:
MakePlace is a tool to preview and edit housing layouts for the game FFXIV.

PC Controls:

  • Move Camera: WASD
  • Rotate Camera: hold right click + move mouse 

Current Features:

  • Fully furnished sample interior
  • Moveable view within the interior

Planned Features:

  • Drag-and-drop furniture and items from a list
  • Drag to move or rotate objects
  • Remove objects from the layout
  • Import layout from file, and export to file

Sign up for the mailing list to receive update notifications!

https://forms.gle/Zttr9wz7ZyCNVDxSA

DevLog: http://cintrest.com/makeplace/
